CustomField.description: To be used by DP Fulfillment batch
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Entitlement_Status__c,'Pending'),1,if(ISPICKVAL(Entitlement_Status__c,'Cannot be entitled') && ISPICKVAL( SWx_Upsell_Proposal__r.Upsell_Status__c,'Ready For Review' ), 2, null))
CustomField.label: Entitlement Status Prioirty
